Double Punch/Manterror/Injector:




Double Punch looked to Black Arachnia, looking her up and down a few times, 
then saw Ramage and Inferno.  

Injector and Manterror came out of hiding, now that everyone had joined the 
part.  Injector came to the left of Black Arachnia, putting his arm around 
her waist.
"So, lovely and deadly, what are...orders?  Go back to base for some R 'n R?"

Manterror laughed.  

Double Punch's head turned, being an expert assassin and being able to hear a 
pin drop in a war with missiles.  Seeing Cyber Claw, he cursed.  The Maximals 
had seen them.  The gig was up.  "Maximal!  Don't let him get away!  Kill 
him!" he went invisible suddenly entering his cloak mode.  Raising a pincher, 
it opened, firing an energy-signature seeking missile off at Carnage.

Manterror stopped chuckling as he saw a missile from no where blast off.  
"Maximal!" he yelled, raising the launchers embedded in his arm, getting 
ready to fire a salvo of ion disks off at the intruder.

Injector brought his hand going up, touching Black Arachnia's back, then her 
neck, then the back of her head, Injector patting it a few times, taking out 
his stinger missile launcher from subspace and firing a poorly aimed rocket 
off that missed Cyber Claw and headed for the Ark.
